text: Gumazim dagɨar avɨriba iniasa puvɨram nɨghnɨzima, dagɨar muziarir a isiba, an ifongiam agɨvaghan kogham. Ezɨ gumazim, dagɨar avɨriba itir gumazimɨn mɨn otivsɨ nɨghnighɨva, bizir a isir kaba, an ifongiam agɨvaghan kogham. Kamaghɨn, dagɨam bagha bar ifongezir arazim ko bizibagh ifongezir arazim, da uaghan dar mɨngariba mongezɨ, e dagh fozir puvatɨgha okam nɨghnɨsi.
